entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
